A.2.1: Daily oral iron and folic acid  supplementation with 30 mg to 60 mg of elemental iron
b and 400 µg 
(0.4 mg) of folic acidc is recommended for pregnant women to 
prevent maternal anaemia, puerperal sepsis, low birth weight, and preterm birth.
